article.name: Colourful Spiral
article.description:
My second programming piece in processing, this time I used a bit of Maths to plot a spiral, using previous points to draw cell shaded shapes.
The result of playing around with different numbers for a while can be seen above, it was quite slow generating, (for whatever reason), so I\'ve just uploaded a 25% scaled down screen of the resulting image.
